answers.answer: Even though you have evidently given your Pathology report, we cannot prescribe or even recommend necessary treatment. The question you have about what treatment is appropriate for your particular case should be ask of your Oncologist who has your complete medical history. He/She is the best person to advise you regarding treatment.  Kindest regards .....
